About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

A highly motivated and enthusiastic professional with a passion for learning new technologies. I am seeking a position that will allow me to utilize my skills and experience to help the company grow and expand my knowledge and skill.

Lightency

Blockchain Developer

Research and development of query system on Ethereum Swarm using ENS and Swarm Feeds. Deployment of Parity Bridge between PoA Ethereum Sidechain and PoW Ethereum Main-net.

CSIR-CDRI

Blockchain Developer

Joined as an Intern, promoted to Team Leader and finally to Co-founder (CTO) of resulting startup. Managing six different research and development projects applying various blockchain use-cases. Developed a global pharma-trading platform on Hyperledger Fabric blockchain called Swastha-Blockchain. Deployed and maintained REST server, client and application on AWS.

RidgeLift Labs

Blockchain Research Intern

Researched on document validation and identity management on the blockchain. Researched on Multi-node Hyperledger Fabric setup with incorporation of KAFKA ordering system.
